wikipedia_page.main:
Adam Brian London (born 12 October 1988) is an English first-class cricketer. He is a left-handed batsman and right arm off spinner.Born in Ashford, Middlesex, he has been selected for Middlesex and has been given the no.19 squad number.
After his short professional career, London became the Director of Cricket at Richmond Cricket Club in South West London
